title: Constructivist Project-Based Learning for Construction Site Safety Education

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with basic construction terminology and on-site work procedures
context.additional_context: Development of safety scenarios tailored to multicultural contexts and field-specific requirements.

learning_goals: Learners identify over 80% of risk factors by analyzing actual construction site accident cases.
Learners form project teams to design and present site-specific safety protocol simulations.
Learners apply a safety inspection checklist using smartphone-based tools in real-world scenarios at least three times.
Learners collaborate with multicultural team members to develop safety communication strategies reflecting cultural differences.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
